DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine whether metabolic , endocrine energetic response short term caloric restriction factor weight loss subject gastric bypass ( GB ) surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Factors Outcomes From Gastric Bypass Surgery
DOC.criteria: Subjects satisfy follow criterion consider screen population eligible enrollment study : 1 . Subject willing give consent comply evaluation treatment schedule 2 . 18 65 year age ( inclusive ) date sign ICD 3 . Subject schedule nonrevisional GB surgery 2 week 4 month sign ICD 4 . Able read , understand , follow study procedure outline ICD . Subjects meet follow criterion eligible enrollment : 1 . Unable unwilling attend followup visit examination 2 . Women pregnant , nursing time screening , plan become pregnant within one year GB surgery 3 . Clinically active cardiac , renal , hepatic GI disorder 4 . Screening laboratory test follow : alanine aminotransferase [ ALT ] and/or aspartate aminotransferase [ AST ] ≥ 4 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) accord VAMC normal range AST : ALT > 2:1 accord VAMC normal range Serum Creatinine ≥ 1.5 time ULN accord VAMC normal range Blood Urea Nitrogen ( BUN ) ≥ 1.5 time ULN accord VAMC normal range Positive test result Hepatitis A , B C 5 . Clinically active thyroid lipid disorder : Thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) flag critical value ( per VAMC lab normal range ) Triglycerides > 400 mg/dL 6 . Anemia : Mean corpuscular volume ( MCV ) , mean corpuscular hemoglobin ( MCH ) , mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration ( MCHC ) outside normal VAMC range ; Hematocrit < 36 % 7 . Uncontrolled hypertension require medication regimen adjustment 3 month prior screen 8 . Currently prescribe take atypical antipsychotic medication 9 . Currently prescribe take chronic , longterm , oral corticosteroid medication 10 . Diabetes require drug regimen include insulin treatment time screen 11 . Unwilling unable refrain procedure surgery involve removal skin tissue could result weight loss 12 . Any medical condition find PI use medical discretion determine subject exclude ; 13 . Participation investigational device drug study ( non survey base trial ) course trial .
